name: @neynar/nodejs-sdk
description: SDK to interact with Neynar APIs (https://docs.neynar.com/)

scripts.generate:neynar-oas: rm -rf src/neynarAPI/neynarV1API; openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/oas/src/v1/spec.yaml -g typescript-axios -o src/neynarAPI/neynarV1API --config src/oas/openapi-generator-config.json
scripts.generate:neynar-oas-v2: rm -rf src/neynarAPI/neynarV2API; openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/oas/src/v2/spec.yaml -g typescript-axios -o src/neynarAPI/neynarV2API --config src/oas/openapi-generator-config.json

author: Neynar
